products.title: Unilux PVC Blackout Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Unilux PVC Blackout Grey Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £10.04 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The Bella Blackout Graphite Roller Blind gives you the best of two worlds – a bright and open window space in the daytime, then total peace and privacy whenever you require it. Thanks to the blackout backed fabric this modern grey roller blind is highly efficient at blocking light and retaining a cosy and calming atmosphere indoors.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX0910 Fabric Colour: Grey Material: Fiberglass core laminated with PVC layered coating Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Unilux PVC Blackout Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Unilux PVC Blackout Grey 89mm Vertical Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £13.33 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A durable, moisture resistant and long lasting collection that is available in a range of stunning shades. This trendy grey vertical blind is very durable and the perfect choice for your bathroom or kitchen as it is moisture resistant. 
 
 Product ID: SDB-VTB0589 Fabric Colour: Grey Material: Fiberglass core laminated with PVC layered coating Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: White Slimline Headrail Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top or Face Fixable     Slat Width: 89mm Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation with Cord tilt OR Wand Tilt and Pull Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Unilux PVC Blackout Grey Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.metadescription: Unilux PVC Blackout Grey Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra in Grey. Made to measure from £34.52 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Unilux PVC Blackout roof blinds come in our most popular colour options - a great way for you to upgrade your skylight window at a value cost. 
 
This option comes with sleek, modern Aluminium framework. 
 
This flame retardant fabric has an fibreglass core and provides up to 20% heat loss reduction.

products.title: Unilux Grey (Moisture Resistant)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Unilux Grey (Moisture Resistant) Bathroom Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Bathroom Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 5000mm
 	Min Drop: 500mm Max Drop: 3500mm
 	Fabric Composition: PVC
 	Louvre Width: 89mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

products.title: Unilux PVC Blackout Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Unilux PVC Blackout Grey Electric Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £135.74 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A durable, moisture resistant and long lasting collection that is available in a range of stunning shades.  
 
This trendy grey roller blind is very durable and the perfect choice for your bathroom or kitchen as it is moisture resistant. The electric aspect of this blind means it is easy to use and perfect for difficult to reach windows.
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX0910 Fabric Colour: Grey Material: Fiberglass core laminated with PVC layered coating Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes
